dt: {bc}the form or constitution of a politically organized unit
{bc}the form of government of a religious denomination

et: probably borrowed from Late Latin {it}polītīa{/it} "citizenship, political organization, constitution of a state, administrative direction," with ending conformed to {et_link|-ity|-ity} {ma}{mat|police:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: a specific form of political organization
